segments.text: Tom , I married Julia last month . Have you already known it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven't . I'm so surprised at the news .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Indeed , we got married too soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations . But have you heard the proverb that if one gets married too hurriedly one may regret it for a long time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . However , I believe that marriage comes by destiny . I knew I would marry Julia when I met her at the first time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to say you're a well-matched couple .
segments.speaker: S2
